plugins.name: github-repo-setup
plugins.description: GitHub repository configuration — standard settings, branch protection, tag rulesets, and security setup

plugins.name: hook-block-ssh-hash-hostnames
plugins.description: Blocks SSH hostname hashing (-H flag and HashKnownHosts=yes) — keeps known_hosts readable

plugins.name: hook-block-stderr-to-null
plugins.description: Blocks commands that redirect stderr to /dev/null — stderr contains valuable diagnostic information

plugins.name: hook-block-tmp-creation
plugins.description: Blocks file creation in /tmp/ — forces use of project-local tmp/ directories instead

plugins.name: hook-block-inline-scripts
plugins.description: Blocks inline code execution (python -c, heredocs) — write to a file first, then execute it

plugins.name: hook-safe-force-push
plugins.description: Blocks unsafe git push --force/--force-with-lease without explicit branch — use git safe-force-push instead

plugins.name: my-conventions
plugins.description: Personal coding conventions — Python/uv preferences, date formats, commit style, and safety rules
